title: PlayStation Claps Back on Xbox’s Call of Duty Offer - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.08.22
description:
It's Jim Ryan vs. Phil Spencer from Greg and Tim's perspective! Let's get ready to rumble!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:00 - Housekeeping

We have an Immortality Gamescast up – both a spoiler-free review AND a Spoilercast with IGN’s Reb Valentine!

I’m hosting the GameSpot Mobile Showcase Swipe RIGHT NOW, but you can catch it later!

Blessing is hosting tomorrow’s D23 Games Showcase tomorrow at 1 pm – we’re reacting he didn’t tell us shit.

The Roper Report  -

00:06:54 - PlayStation on Xbox’s COD Offer
00:18:14 - Xbox Testing New Home UI
00:30:01 - Velma Is Gonna Stop Being a Snitch
00:33:43 - Ad
00:35:55 - Mr. Battlefield Is Leaving EA
00:38:30 - Multiple New Battlefield "Experiences" Coming, Including Narrative Campaign From Halo Designer
00:45:16 - Cyberpunk 2077 Ending Development on PS4 and Xbox One
00:48:51 - NBA 2K23 Packaging Warns Of Server Shutdown Scheduled For 2024
00:50:58 - A PlayStation London's Producer has died
00:51:59 - Play Stray, Raise Money for American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals!
00:53:00 - Queen Elizabeth has died, possibly delaying a Nintendo Direct
00:55:26 - Out today
00:57:58 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & Greg
